医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
维生素 D 水平低与妊娠期和产后抑郁风险增加相关研究表明，维生素 D 水平低可能会导致孕妇焦虑和抑郁，因此强调了充足补充的重要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241029/Low-vitamin-D-linked-with-increased-depression-risk-in-pregnancy-and-after-birth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241029/Low-vitamin-D-linked-with-increased-depression-risk-in-pregnancy-and-after-birth.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3530e125-6304-4351-851b-0097315ad3b6 Tue, 29 Oct 2024 07:59:00 -0400 Low vitamin D associated with increased depression risk in pregnancy and after birth
MGI 和 OncoDNA 联手为实验室提供简化的 NGS 工作流程，用于在临床实践中实施综合基因组分析 (CGP) OncoDEEP® 试剂盒华大智造（华大智造或其子公司，统称华大智造）是一家致力于构建推动生命科学创新的核心工具和技术的公司，今天宣布与专注于精准医疗的基因组和治疗诊断公司OncoDNA达成合作。用于治疗癌症和遗传疾病的药物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241029/MGI-and-OncoDNA-join-forces-to-offer-laboratories-a-streamlined-NGS-workflow-for-implementing-Compressive-Genomic-Profiling- (CGP)-OncoDEEPc2ae-Kit-in-clinical-practice.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241029/MGI-and-OncoDNA-join-forces-to-offer-laboratories-a-streamlined-NGS-workflow-for-implementing-Compressive-Genomic-Profiling- (CGP)-OncoDEEPc2ae-Kit-in-clinical-practice.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e7b33368-7524-4646-872b-12ede50d60d2 Tue, 29 Oct 2024 07:52:00 -0400 MGI and OncoDNA join forces to offer laboratories a streamlined NGS workflow for implementing Comprehensive Genomic Profiling (CGP) OncoDEEP® Kit in clinical practice
维生素 D 可能是控制 2 型糖尿病的缺失环节吗？最近的研究表明维生素 D 在 2 型糖尿病管理中的作用正在不断演变，有证据表明它可以改善血糖水平并减少与糖尿病相关的炎症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241029/Could-vitamin-D-be-the-missing-link-in-managing-type-2-diabetes-Recent-study-weighs-in.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241029/Could-vitamin-D-be-the-missing-link-in-managing-type-2-diabetes-Recent-study-weighs-in.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5da4d614-c140-4a5e-837c-42b939bd4e2e Tue, 29 Oct 2024 07:33:00 -0400 Could vitamin D be the missing link in managing type 2 diabetes? Recent study weighs in
万斯错误地将乡村医院关闭归咎于非法移民最近在威斯康星州举行的一次总统竞选集会上，参议员 JD 万斯（俄亥俄州共和党人）被问到，面对医院关闭的情况，特朗普政府将如何保护农村医疗保健的获取，例如今年欧克莱尔和奇珀瓦福尔斯的两家医院关闭。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241029/Vance-wrongly-blames-rural-hospital-closures-on-immigrants-in-the-country-illegally.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241029/Vance-wrongly-blames-rural-hospital-closures-on-immigrants-in-the-country-illegally.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c55d027a-89b9-4c0b-99bb-9d2b93bbf392 Tue, 29 Oct 2024 07:07:05 -0400 Vance wrongly blames rural hospital closures on immigrants in the country illegally
研究发现白癜风与心脏病和中风风险增加有关研究表明白癜风患者的心血管风险升高，强调了加强监测和预防性医疗措施的必要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241029/Vitiligo-linked-to-increased-risk-of-heart-disease-and-中风-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241029/Vitiligo-linked-to-increased-risk-of-heart-disease-and-中风-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=40c34bd1-d462-4216-8882-0f3a8b43b7d6 Tue, 29 Oct 2024 06:54:00 -0400 Vitiligo linked to increased risk of heart disease and stroke, study finds
“梦想家”今年可以参加 ACA 计划——但法庭挑战可能会阻碍当平价医疗法案（即奥巴马医改）本周在全国范围内开始公开报名时，之前被禁止报名的群体将首次有资格：“梦想家”。这是对没有移民文件就被带到美国的儿童的称呼，这些儿童后来有资格参加儿童入境暂缓遣返计划。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241029/e28098Dreamerse28099-can-enroll-in-ACA-plans-this-year-e28094-but-a-court-challenge-could-get-in-the-方式.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241029/e28098Dreamerse28099-can-enroll-in-ACA-plans-this-year-e28094-but-a-court-challenge-could-get-in-the- way.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=adcacd48-3324-45d6-b27e-4eee6191aa1a Tue, 29 Oct 2024 06:41:38 -0400 ‘Dreamers’ can enroll in ACA plans this year — but a court challenge could get in the way
我个人的乳腺癌之旅和探索空间转录组学https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241029/My-personal-journey-with-breast-cancer-and-exploring-spatial-transcriptomics.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241029/My-personal-journey-with-breast-cancer-and-exploring-spatial-transcriptomics.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=60c1640a-40dd-4ab6-b492-c4a5badc903d Tue, 29 Oct 2024 06:25:00 -0400 My personal journey with breast cancer and exploring spatial transcriptomics
新研究表明，单腿平衡可能是神经肌肉衰老的最佳指标衰老会显着影响单足的平衡和力量，突出表明需要采取有针对性的干预措施来解决老年人的神经肌肉衰退问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241029/Balance-on-one-leg-may-be-the-best-indicator-of-neuromuscular-aging-new-study-suggests.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241029/Balance-on-one-leg-may-be-the-best-indicator-of-neuromuscular-aging-new-study-suggests.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ebadf756-ad9d-46c5-9eb1-9458c8b85db4 Tue, 29 Oct 2024 06:01:00 -0400 Balance on one leg may be the best indicator of neuromuscular aging, new study suggests
遗传标记可能彻底改变新生儿败血症诊断一项新的研究表明，新生儿的遗传特征可以在症状开始出现之前预测新生儿败血症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241029/Genetic-marker-could-revolutionize-neonatal-sepsis-diagnosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241029/Genetic-marker-could-revolutionize-neonatal-sepsis-diagnosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=17d0f097-a372-42a6-8a75-bfa0ad650cb9 Tue, 29 Oct 2024 02:02:51 -0400 Genetic marker could revolutionize neonatal sepsis diagnosis
揭开抗癌之谜每个多细胞生物 -；无论是翱翔于天空、畅游于海洋深处还是漫游于地球表面——；有一个共同的弱点：细胞不受控制的生长，即癌症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241029/Unraveling-the-mystery-of-cancer-resistance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241029/Unraveling-the-mystery-of-cancer-resistance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=723ca56c-039c-40c6-b5c5-d243620f0337 Tue, 29 Oct 2024 01:36:42 -0400 Unraveling the mystery of cancer resistance
